These 4 things i dont know how change!

item.title: PLZZ HELP(idk what to do)
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Sigh
I can tell you how to change all that, but since you said “You made the server”, (clearly…)

Hi i made this server

I’ll only tell you how to change the starting text.
Basically, find the client.java file, open it up with notepad, and ctrl+f and search for one of the lines, Eg, If your (you’re*) in a black area when you" etc
Search for that, and then you’ll see all the other lines.
Then change them to w/e you want.

kthnxbai.

Read full topic
